subtests.name: Test pointer events in the main document
Test pointer events in an iframe
mouse pointerdown event is a PointerEvent event
mouse pointerdown.isTrusted value is true
mouse pointerdown.composed value is valid
mouse pointerdown.bubbles value is valid
mouse pointerdown.cancelable value is valid
mouse pointerdown.pressure value is valid
mouse pointerdown properties for pointerType = mouse
